sentences.en: A young man of his years needed to have a separate room.
sentences.cn: 他那个年纪的年轻人需要有个单独的房间。

sentences.en: Don't leave a child alone in a room with an open fire.
sentences.cn: 房间里有裸露的明火时，不要让孩子独处其中。

sentences.en: Fluorescent lights flickered, and then the room was brilliantly, blindingly bright.
sentences.cn: 荧光灯闪了几下，接着屋子里豁然大亮，刺得人睁不开眼。

sentences.en: He had all the window frames in the room remade.
sentences.cn: 他把房间里所有的窗框都翻新了。

sentences.en: He had wandered to the far end of the room.
sentences.cn: 他转到屋子的那一头。

sentences.en: Here’s your key - room 348.
sentences.cn: 这是你的钥匙——348号房间。

sentences.en: I imagined the eyes of the others in the room upon me.
sentences.cn: 我觉得屋里其他人似乎都在盯着我。

sentences.en: I looked around the room.
sentences.cn: 我四下看了看房间。

sentences.en: I took the phone, and she went discreetly into the living room.
sentences.cn: 我拿起了电话，她知趣地进了客厅。

sentences.en: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room.
sentences.cn: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

sentences.en: Serve the cake warm or at room temperature, cut in squares.
sentences.cn: 等蛋糕温热或凉至室温时切成四方块端上桌。

sentences.en: She checked the seating arrangements before the guests filed into the dining-room.
sentences.cn: 在客人们鱼贯进入餐厅之前，她核实了一遍座位安排。

sentences.en: She nodded toward a man who was standing across the room (= on the other side of the room ) .
sentences.cn: 她朝站在屋子另一头的一个男人点点头。

sentences.en: Someone was laughing in the next room (= the one beside the one you are in ) .
sentences.cn: 隔壁房间有人在笑。

sentences.en: The doctor worked busily beneath the blinding lights of the delivery room.
sentences.cn: 这位医生在产房刺目的灯光下忙碌着。

sentences.en: The light went out, and the room was plunged into darkness.
sentences.cn: 灯熄了，屋里陷入一片漆黑。

sentences.en: The Marshal stepped over the vacuum-cleaner and stumped out of the room.
sentences.cn: 元帅迈过真空吸尘器，脚步沉重地走出了房间。

sentences.en: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
sentences.cn: 房间很安静，无人主动提供更多的信息。

sentences.en: the secretary entered with the coffee tray and made room for it on the desk.
sentences.cn: 秘书端着咖啡托盘走进来，在桌上腾出地方放下。

sentences.en: There was not much elbow room in the cockpit of a Snipe.
sentences.cn: “沙锥鸟”战斗机的驾驶舱空间不太宽敞。

phrases.phrase: no (或 not) room to swing a cat
phrases.tran_cn: (幽默)没有转身的余地，地方狭窄
烟雾弥漫的房间，密谈室（指少数权势人士非公开不民主的幕后政治谈判或决策）

trans.tran_cn: 房间，空间，余地，房间里所有的人
trans.tran_en: a part of the inside of a building that has its own walls, floor, and ceiling

trans.tran_cn: 为…提供住处；租房，合住；投宿，住宿；留…住宿
trans.tran_en: to rent and live in a room somewhere

trans.tran_cn: 租房，合住，为…提供住处，投宿，住宿，留…住宿
